p: We must not return to ‘business as usual’ in our Covid‐19 recovery. We must ensure that climate‐positive, justice‐centred policies and investments are at the heart of building back better. My podcast, Mothers of Invention, launched a project called Climate RE‐FRAME 11 earlier this year, highlighting 100 experts and community activists from across the Black, Asian and other ethnic minority communities in the UK who are leading in addressing the climate crisis. We need their voices and perspectives in the media, at climate conferences and in working groups – at the moment that representation is sorely lacking.
